TabulaRasa.UpdateDef.content:
Version 3.0 Mechadroids are now ready to be used in 1.4, this comes with a change of dependency from Humanoid Alien Races 2.0 to Asmiov, they now use the universal energy system in that so this no longer includes a redundant set of 'power cells'. Some changes:
- Mechadroids textures have been updated slightly. - Mechadroids of each kind now have multiple body types. - Crafting recipes for Mechadroids are now simpler, 'mechadroid parts' are no longer a thing. - Repairing damaged Mechadroids is now done simply using steel. - Crafted Mechadroids are now white, and will gradually get their more aged colour that most vanilla mechanoids have over time. - Player Mechadroids can now be repainted, at any time using a gizmo, and won't visibly 'age' like they normally do if they are.
And if you have Biotech you'll see these differences:
- Mechadroid Gammas now function as Mechanitors naturally. - Mechadroids are instead crafted at the Large Mechanoid Gestator.
Right click to dismiss update.
